rules.description: [window management] [Internal Keyboard] cmd+alt h is move window left
[window management] [Internal Keyboard] cmd+alt l is move window right
[window management] [Internal Keyboard] cmd+alt k is move window up
[window management] [Internal Keyboard] cmd+alt j is move window down
[window management] [Internal Keyboard] cmd+alt f is maximize window
[window management] [Redox] hyper h is move window left
[window management] [Redox] hyper l is move window right
[window management] [Redox] hyper k is move window up
[window management] [Redox] hyper j is move window down
[window management] [Redox] hyper f is maximize window
[firefox] Cmd-t to Cmd-Control-t for custom binding
[firefox] Cmd-l to Cmd-Control-l for custom binding
[firefox] Cmd-n to Cmd-Control-n for custom binding
[kitty] use Cmd-w for nav mode
[kitty] [Internal Keybord] use caps lock to escape nav mode
[kitty] esc to escape nav mode
[kitty] h is left in nav mode
[kitty] l is right in nav mode
[kitty] j is down in nav mode
[kitty] k is up in nav mode
[kitty] q is close window in nav mode
[kitty] K is next tab in nav mode
[kitty] J is previous tab in nav mode
[kitty] v is new split in nav mode
[Alfred] use C-j for down
[Alfred] use C-k for up
[Discord] use C-j for prev convo
[Discord] use C-k for next convo
[Slack] use C-j for prev convo
[Slack] use C-k for next convo
[Spotify] use C-j for down
[Spotify] use C-k for up
[iMessage] use C-j to navigate down conversation list
[iMessage] use C-k to navigate up conversation list
Change caps_lock to control when used as modifier, escape when used alone. (Internal Keyboard)
Better Shifting: Parentheses on shift keys. (Internal Keyboard)
Change Fn + h/j/k/l to Arrows (Internal Keyboard)
Rebind Cmd-Tab to Cmd-F19 for Alt-Tab
Rebind Cmd-` to Cmd-F18 for Alt-Tab
